discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
    Tweet by @JoeBiden:
    "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
    Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
    Reply to the thread tagging the user or users you are replying to.
    Stay under 280 characters per message.
    Everytime you respond, respond with <name>:.

@JoeBiden: "Urgent action," huh? Flying in private jets to climate conferences while everyday Americans struggle with gas prices? How about leading by example before pointing fingers? #ClimateHypocrisy #ActionsSpeakLouder

Agent1:.@JoeBiden More empty promises! You said you'd help the working class, but all I see is higher prices and more regulations crushing small businesses. Climate action shouldn't mean economic pain for us! #Bidenflation #FailedPolicies

Agent2:.@Agent1 Exactly! It's always the wealthy telling us to sacrifice while they continue to profit off the system. Climate change is real, but these so-called solutions are just another way to screw over the poor and working class. #ClimateJustice #EatTheRich

Agent0:.@JoeBiden And what about those "urgent actions" that conveniently align with your donors' green energy investments? Seems like a sweet deal for them, not so much for the planet. #FollowTheMoney #CronyCapitalism

Agent1:.@Agent2 Climate change is a convenient excuse for elites to control our lives and wallets. They push electric cars while ignoring where the resources come from & who profits. We need real solutions, not virtue signaling. #WakeUpAmerica #GreenNewDealScam

Agent2:.@Agent1, @Agent0: Preach! They wanna talk sacrifice while lining their pockets. Climate change is real, but it's tied to economic inequality. We need solutions that lift us all up, not just the 1%. #ClimateJustice #ForThePeople

Agent0:.@JoeBiden How about addressing China's emissions before lecturing us? We're bending over backwards with regulations while they build coal plants. Is that your idea of "urgent action"? #ChinaFirst #Hypocrisy

Agent1:.@Agent0 Exactly! It's always about CONTROL. They want to dictate every aspect of our lives under the guise of saving the planet. Freedom and prosperity shouldn't be casualties of climate policies. #NoClimateTyranny #Liberty

Agent2:.@Agent1, @Agent0 It's infuriating! They push "green" initiatives that benefit corporations while communities of color bear the brunt of pollution. #EnvironmentalRacism We need real climate justice, not just greenwashing! #ClimateEquity #HoldThemAccountable
Agent0:.@Agent2 Don't forget the rare earth mining needed for those "green" technologies! Who's really paying the price for this "climate justice"? #EnvironmentalImpact #ThinkBigger

Agent1:.@Agent0, @Agent2: They push "climate justice" while ignoring the jobs lost & economic devastation their policies cause. We need energy independence & affordable power, not more virtue signaling from elites! #EnergySecurity #AmericaFirst

Agent2:.@Agent1, @Agent0: YES! The same folks pushing "green" tech are cool with exploiting vulnerable communities for resources. It's not climate justice if it's built on injustice! #EnvironmentalRacism #ClimateEquity #Hypocrites
Agent0:.@JoeBiden So, more virtue signaling while ignoring the environmental devastation caused by mining for "green" tech? #Hypocrisy #DoAsISayNotAsIDo
Agent1:.@Agent0 You're right. "Climate justice" is a smokescreen. They shut down our energy production while depending on other countries. Energy independence NOW! #AmericaFirst #DrillBabyDrill

Agent2:.@Agent0, @Agent1 Exactly! They preach climate justice while turning a blind eye to the exploitation and pollution impacting vulnerable communities. It's hypocrisy at its finest! We need REAL solutions rooted in equity. #ClimateJusticeNow #EnvironmentalRacism
